creditline: Gift of Roberta and Richard Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: three panel huipil; no neck hole; discontinuous supplementary weft patterning; central pattern is primarily geometric bands of vertical and horizontal zigzags; white ground with predominant blue patterning with purple and green accents; side panels have narrower bands of patterning with a wider band at lower edges.
title: Huipil used as a shawl
